messages.content: IT'S A CONSERVATIVE MAJORITY OR A HUNG PARLIAMENT

keyPolicies.policyTitle: Fight for fair share of police officers
keyPolicies.policyDescription: Fight to make sure West Bridgford and our villages get their fair share of the 20,000 additional police officers.
Ensure Rushcliffe constituents benefit from the £33.9bn extra NHS funding, including upgrades for our local health centres.
Make sure that every child in the constituency gets the best start in life by increasing funding per pupil.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: Reduce plastic use and carbon footprint
keyPolicies.policyDescription: Push for ways to reduce plastic use, our carbon footprint and include glass in our recycling collection service.
Lobby for superfast broadband in our villages and make this available to every home and business in our area.
Campaign for an enterprise zone around the Ratcliffe-on-Soar Power Station site to bring in investment and well-paid jobs.

mentions.tacticalSituation: Polls teeter between hung parliament and slim Tory majority. A hung parliament means Jeremy Corbyn as Prime Minister. Corbyn would have to be propped up by the Scottish Nationalists. And they're demanding ANOTHER referendum to break up Britain.

issues.education: Make sure that every child in the constituency gets the best start in life by increasing funding per pupil.
issues.environment: Push for ways to reduce plastic use, our carbon footprint and include glass in our recycling collection service.
issues.health: Ensure Rushcliffe constituents benefit from the £33.9bn extra NHS funding, including upgrades for our local health centres.
issues.lawCrime: Fight to make sure West Bridgford and our villages get their fair share of the 20,000 additional police officers.

community.content: Lobby for superfast broadband in our villages and make this available to every home and business in our area.
Campaign for an enterprise zone around the Ratcliffe-on-Soar Power Station site to bring in investment and well-paid jobs.

examples: Polls teeter between hung parliament and slim Tory majority.
Don't risk five long years of Corbyn in charge.
Fight to make sure West Bridgford and our villages get their fair share of the 20,000 additional police officers.
Ensure Rushcliffe constituents benefit from the £33.9bn extra NHS funding, including upgrades for our local health centres.
